11.name: Narration
11.text:
Sol noticed unusual sounds and voices coming from
a room at the inn, so she approached the door out
of curiosity.

12.name: Narration
12.text:
The door was slightly ajar, allowing a glimpse
into the room. Unable to resist her curiosity, Sol
peered through the gap.

14.name: Narration
14.text:
The dimly lit room of the cheap inn was faintly
illuminated by the moonlight. And within it, there
were two intertwined shadows writhing together.

15.name: Narration
15.text:
The sound of dripping fluids, the collision of
flesh, and the sorrowful sighs leaking out were
filling the room.

17.name: Isk
17.text:
"Ahh... ngh... adventurer, sama... ah... How
about... my body...?"

18.name: Man
18.text: "Ku, a, a, it feels good...! Isk-sama...!!"

19.name: Isk
19.text:
"I... feel very... comfortable... being filled up
by the adventurer-sama... deep inside..."

20.name: Isk
20.text: "Ku, uun...! Ha, u... a, a, a... a, aa..."

22.name: Sol
22.text:
(Eh...!? That's... Could it be... th-they're
mating...!?)

24.name: Narration
24.text:
Sol was astonished by the scene she glimpsed
through the gap in the door. That beautiful silver
dragon was entwined with a human, indulging in an
intimate act.

25.name: Narration
25.text:
Although her expression remained unchanged from
usual, the sight of her flushed cheeks and sweat
streaming down made it appear incredibly lewd.

26.name: Narration
26.text:
Unaware of Sol's astonishment, the two
passionately entwined in excitement.

28.name: Isk
28.text:
"Ah, ah...! It's good, it's good...! I feel
really, good, ah, nghh...!!"

30.name: Narration
30.text:
Bathed in the moonlight, Isk's ample bosom bounced
freely as she writhed her sweaty body, indulging
in pleasure.

31.name: Narration
31.text:
The man also twisted his expression in pleasure,
not letting go of Isk's hand. The secret place was
mixing the man's love juices and Isk's fluids,
dripping and wetting the bed sheets.

33.name: Isk
33.text: "A-amazing, a, ugh, nn, nnn...! Hiu, u, ugh...!"

34.name: Isk
34.text:
"I, I'm already, already, going to...! Ah, ah, I'm
coming, I'm already, ah, aaaaaahhh...!!"

36.name: Isk
36.text:
"Please release it inside me...! Please release
everything inside me...!!"

42.name: Narration
42.text:
Unable to bear it, Sol averted her eyes from the
scene and fled. It was a great shock for her to
witness the intimate act of a man and a woman,
especially when they were familiar faces, and she
was deeply shaken.

44.name: Sol
44.text:
(Th-those two... were, together...!? Ohhh... I've
opened the door to an unknown world...)

46.name: Narration
46.text:
Sol blushed and tried to calm her heart, but the
heat in the core of her body did not easily
subside.

47.name: Narration
47.text:
Unbeknownst to Sol, at the back of the room
illuminated by moonlight, the two were sweetly
entwined with each other multiple times.
